reviews.text: As a student p6 ts year, this sch is actually kinda good but im def not Christian btw, diff religion but this school is good. Some teachers r strict fr, but teachers are actually nice tbh. Only the toilet is so bad pls change it they said that the 1st floor toilet behind the library staircase is haunted, thankfully i never saw any ppl making tiktok inside the toilet. But the library is so nice
Very friendly teachers who are easy to approach. Delicious food and good school layout, definitely recommend it to everyone

That’s is actually my alumni school. I’m currently in the secondary school under the same name. The Teachers can be friendly and strict at the same time. Also, the food there are quite cheap and so be prepared to let your child to have a lot of worksheets coming your way. The only concern is that it’s quite far and the hours are quite long. But very good school :)
Besides a 5 star academic team keeping parents well informed on the next quarter events date. Professional and helpful security team as well

The culture is wonderful for the students, nurtured holistically through many significant steps by the great teachers who have led the way since the school’s inception. The stories of greats are embedded in the lives of the children and staff, but most will probably tell you (in a less round-about way) that it’s God’s many blessings.

And they’ll probably keep telling you that till they die
